title: Black screen in champ select
body:
1. Entered coop-vs-ai queue
2. Realised I had to do something away from the computer so left the queue
3. A few minutes later re-entered coop-vs-ai queue
4. A match instantly pops up which I accept
5. The main area of the client changes to a black screen (instead of the usual champ select interface)

The status bar was still displayed as normal, and the friends list indicated that I was in champion select. I waited for a bit but figured the game might start if I waited too long so felt forced to close the client.

replies.body:
Glitches op. Might want to try repairing your client (back up your item sets first!).

This might just be a one-off thing, though.
